verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שָׂרְפ֛וֹ <S%H8313><s%> [the punishment] thereof because he burned עַצְמ֥וֹת <S%H6106><s%> the bones מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֱד֖וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom לַשִּֽׂיד׃ <S%H7875><s%> into lime

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> But I will send אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בְּמוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> upon Moab וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> and it shall devour אַרְמְנ֣וֹת <S%H759><s%> the palaces הַקְּרִיּ֑וֹת <S%H7152><s%> of Kerioth וּמֵ֤ת <S%H4191><s%> shall die בְּשָׁאוֹן֙ <S%H7588><s%> with tumult מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> and Moab בִּתְרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> with shouting בְּק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [and] with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet

וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> And I will cut off שׁוֹפֵ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> the judge מִקִּרְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7130><s%> from the midst וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֶ֛יהָ <S%H8269><s%> all the princes אֶהֱר֥וֹג <S%H2026><s%> thereof and will slay עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> thereof with him saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because מָאֳסָ֞ם <S%H3988><s%> [the punishment] thereof because they have despised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְחֻקָּיו֙ <S%H2706><s%> his commandments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁמָ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> and have not kept וַיַּתְעוּם֙ <S%H8582><s%> caused them to err כִּזְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3577><s%> and their lies אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> have walked אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> the which their fathers אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> upon Judah וְאָכְלָ֖ה <S%H398><s%> and it shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <S%H759><s%> the palaces יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem פ

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <S%H6588><s%> transgressions יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and for four לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> I will not turn away עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> its Because מִכְרָ֤ם <S%H4376><s%> [the punishment] thereof because they sold בַּכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> for silver צַדִּ֔יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> and the poor בַּעֲב֥וּר <S%H5668><s%> because of נַעֲלָֽיִם׃ <S%H5275><s%> for a pair of shoes

הַשֹּׁאֲפִ֤ים <S%H7602><s%> That pant עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> after עֲפַר־ <S%H6083><s%> after the dust אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> on the head דַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1800><s%> of the poor וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way עֲנָוִ֖ים <S%H6035><s%> of the meek יַטּ֑וּ <S%H5186><s%> and turn aside וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and a man וְאָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> and his father יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> resort אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <S%H5291><s%> in unto the [same] maid לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> order חַלֵּ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> to profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> my holy

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בְּגָדִ֤ים <S%H899><s%> upon clothes חֲבֻלִים֙ <S%H2254><s%> laid to pledge יַטּ֔וּ <S%H5186><s%> And they lay [themselves] down אֵ֖צֶל <S%H681><s%> by כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> every altar וְיֵ֤ין <S%H3196><s%> the wine עֲנוּשִׁים֙ <S%H6064><s%> of the condemned יִשְׁתּ֔וּ <S%H8354><s%> and they drink בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> [in] the house אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> of their god

וְאָ֨נֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I הִשְׁמַ֤דְתִּי <S%H8045><s%> Yet destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> I the Amorite מִפְּנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> them כְּגֹ֤בַהּ <S%H1363><s%> them whose height אֲרָזִים֙ <S%H730><s%> of the cedars גָּבְה֔וֹ <S%H1363><s%> [was] like the height וְחָסֹ֥ן <S%H2634><s%> and he [was] strong ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כָּֽאַלּוֹנִ֑ים <S%H437><s%> as the oaks וָאַשְׁמִ֤יד <S%H8045><s%> yet I destroyed פִּרְיוֹ֙ <S%H6529><s%> his fruit מִמַּ֔עַל <S%H4605><s%> from above וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <S%H8328><s%> and his roots מִתָּֽחַת׃ <S%H8478><s%> Thahash

וְאָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I הֶעֱלֵ֥יתִי <S%H5927><s%> Also I brought you up אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וָאוֹלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> led אֶתְכֶ֤ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> through the wilderness אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> you forty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> of the Amorite

וָאָקִ֤ים <S%H6965><s%> And I raised up מִבְּנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> of your sons לִנְבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> for prophets וּמִבַּחוּרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H970><s%> and of your young men לִנְזִרִ֑ים <S%H5139><s%> for Nazarites הַאַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> so אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else זֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> O בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [Is it] not even thus O ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַתַּשְׁק֥וּ <S%H8248><s%> to drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּזִרִ֖ים <S%H5139><s%> But ye gave the Nazarites יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַנְּבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophets צִוִּיתֶ֣ם <S%H6680><s%> and commanded לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not תִּנָּבְאֽוּ׃ <S%H5012><s%> Prophesy

הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מֵעִ֖יק <S%H5781><s%> Behold I am pressed תַּחְתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H8478><s%> beneath כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after תָּעִיק֙ <S%H5781><s%> is pressed הָעֲגָלָ֔ה <S%H5699><s%> under you as a cart הַֽמְלֵאָ֥ה <S%H4395><s%> fruit לָ֖הּ עָמִֽיר׃ <S%H5995><s%> of sheaves

וְאָבַ֤ד <S%H6><s%> shall perish מָנוֹס֙ <S%H4498><s%> Therefore the flight מִקָּ֔ל <S%H7031><s%> from the swift וְחָזָ֖ק <S%H2389><s%> and the strong לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְאַמֵּ֣ץ <S%H553><s%> shall not strengthen כֹּח֑וֹ <S%H3581><s%> his force וְגִבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> neither shall the mighty לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְמַלֵּ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> deliver נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> himself

וְתֹפֵ֤שׂ <S%H8610><s%> that handleth הַקֶּ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H7198><s%> the bow לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> Neither shall he stand וְקַ֥ל <S%H7031><s%> and [he that is] swift בְּרַגְלָ֖יו <S%H7272><s%> of foot לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְמַלֵּ֑ט <S%H4422><s%> shall not deliver וְרֹכֵ֣ב <S%H7392><s%> [himself] neither shall he that rideth הַסּ֔וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יְמַלֵּ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> deliver נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> himself

וְאַמִּ֥יץ <S%H533><s%> strong לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> care for בַּגִּבּוֹרִ֑ים <S%H1368><s%> among the mighty עָר֛וֹם <S%H6174><s%> naked יָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> shall flee away בַּיּוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פ
